text: Ryan Seacrest speaks on stage at the 2017 Hamptons Paddle & Party for Pink at Fairview on Mecox Bay in Bridgehampton on Saturday, Aug. 5, 2017, in New York. Ryan Seacrest is speaking out about a sexual harassment allegation leveled against him.
